snippet: On Sunday, the show's finale had a total viewership 10.5 million viewers. Among viewers 18 to 49, its first airing of each episode has drawn a rating higher than network hits like "The Big Bang Theory" and "The Voice."
abstract: On Sunday, the show's finale had a total viewership 10.5 million viewers. Among viewers 18 to 49, its first airing of each episode has drawn a rating higher than network hits like "The Big Bang Theory" and "The Voice."

headline.main: 'Walking Dead' Ratings Eclipse Even Those of Top Broadcast Shows
